msg.msgText:
A "DestinationMappingRule" composite object can be deleted using the "delete" option of the "imaserver" command.
SYNTAX: imaserver delete DestinationMappingRule help imaserver delete DestinationMappingRule "Name=value"
EXAMPLE: imaserver delete DestinationMappingRule "Name=DestMapRule1"

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
